seo.pageTitle: Buy cryptocurrency directly from your MetaMask wallet | MetaMask
seo.pageDescription: Buy cryptocurrency at the best fiat to crypto exchange rates. Swap digital currency straight into your MetaMask wallet.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Buying cryptocurrency with MetaMask has never been easier. Just head on over to the "Buy" button to get started.

The improved user experience shows you the best quotes based on the token you want to buy, your region, and the provider that is available to you.

With a funded MetaMask wallet, you’re ready to explore Web3 on your own terms.

node.headline: Own your crypto in a private and safe way

childMarkdownRemark.html: Any information you provide during the purchase is not shared with MetaMask: we don’t store or process payment details, personal data, email addresses, etc.
Unlike a centralized exchange, neither our partners nor MetaMask have access to the cryptocurrency after purchase. As a result, users can immediately use their assets without a holding period.
MetaMask doesn’t promote any provider: but we do vet them. MetaMask ensures that all providers comply with applicable regulations and that they are legitimate, responsible parties.

backgroundImage.title: Own your crypto in a private and safe way bg

node.headline: Transact safely with our global partners
The best way to buy cryptocurrency

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our partners support credit and debit cards globally: Visa and MasterCard.
You can pay with Apple Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay.
ACH transfer in the USA and SEPA in Europe.

modules.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate

image.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate

imageDarkMode.title: Best fiat to crypto exchange rate dark

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Each payment method has a different fee structure based on the region. Generally speaking, credit or debit transactions are more expensive with lower limits, while bank transfers have fewer fees and higher purchase limits.
A user can expect to pay a processing fee, a MetaMask fee and the market rate for gas.

Some users end up paying gas fees twice: once when they buy on a centralized exchange or elsewhere, and then again when depositing into MetaMask. Buying cryptocurrency on MetaMask eliminates this double cost, and additionally, the funds will be available immediately.

backgroundImage.title: The best way to buy cryptocurrency bg

childMarkdownRemark.html: You can buy stablecoins and native tokens from within MetaMask globally across a wide variety of networks: Ethereum, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Fantom, and Celo.
Buy crypto how you want, when you want
You can buy cryptocurrency in an easy way through vetted partners.
You can buy cryptocurrency with your preferred payment method through easy and smooth partner integration.
You can expect favorable quotes with low fees and minimal shifts in exchange rates, regardless of how much crypto you buy.

node.headline: Download MetaMask and start buying crypto
